title: Murud Beach
subtitle: Golden sands and the majestic Murud-Janjira Fort
overview: Murud Beach, located in the Raigad district of Maharashtra, is one of the most scenic and historically rich coastal destinations on the Konkan coast. Known for its wide golden sands, calm blue waters, and proximity to the famous Murud-Janjira Fort, this beach beautifully blends natural beauty with Maratha history.

The beach stretches for about 3 km and is perfect for long walks, horse rides, and water sports. Its laid-back vibe, clean environment, and stunning sunsets make it a favorite among families and couples.
Murud is also known for its coastal cuisine, charming homestays, and warm hospitality — offering visitors a balanced mix of relaxation and exploration.

highlights.title: Golden Sandy Beach
highlights.description: Wide stretch of clean, golden sand perfect for relaxation and strolls.

highlights.title: Murud-Janjira Fort View
highlights.description: The iconic sea fort visible from the shore adds historical grandeur.

highlights.title: Calm & Safe Waters
highlights.description: Ideal for swimming, beach games, and light water activities.

highlights.title: Stunning Sunsets
highlights.description: Witness breathtaking sunset views across the Arabian Sea.

geography.intro: Murud Beach lies along the Konkan coast in Raigad district, around 160 km from Mumbai and 50 km from Alibaug.

climate.description: Murud experiences tropical maritime weather — pleasant winters, warm summers, and heavy monsoons. The post-monsoon period is ideal for beach activities.

geography.conclusion: Its golden sands, calm waters, and proximity to historical forts make Murud a must-visit Konkan beach.

activities.title: Water Sports
activities.description: Enjoy thrilling activities like banana rides, parasailing, and jet skiing.
info: Managed by local vendors with safety gear

activities.title: Horse & Buggy Rides
activities.description: Experience traditional horse and buggy rides along the beach promenade.

activities.title: Photography & Sunset Views
activities.description: Capture panoramic beach views and the distant Murud-Janjira Fort silhouette.
info: Best lighting during sunrise and sunset
Fort visible clearly during low tide

activities.title: Seafood Tasting
activities.description: Relish local delicacies like fried fish, prawns, and crab curry at nearby eateries.
info: Try homestay meals for authentic taste

attractions.title: Murud-Janjira Fort
attractions.description: A 17th-century island fort built by the Siddis, famous for its invincible design.
attractions.distance: 2 km by boat from Murud Beach

attractions.title: Kashid Beach
attractions.description: A serene white sand beach just 18 km away, perfect for day trips and water sports.

attractions.title: Phansad Wildlife Sanctuary
attractions.description: A dense forest reserve home to diverse flora and fauna, ideal for nature walks.

marineLife.intro: Murud’s coastal waters support a moderate variety of marine and bird life, thriving in clean and undisturbed habitats.

items.title: Fish & Crabs
items.description: Common species like mackerel and crabs can be spotted near the shore.

items.title: Sea Birds
items.description: Seagulls, egrets, and sandpipers often flock around during early mornings.

items.title: Coastal Flora
items.description: Casuarinas and mangrove clusters stabilize the dunes and enrich biodiversity.

conclusion: The beach’s ecosystem is well-preserved due to local conservation efforts.
Visitors are encouraged to maintain cleanliness and avoid disturbing wildlife.

howToReach.title: By Road
details: Murud is 160 km from Mumbai via Alibaug and 50 km from Alibaug town.
Regular MSRTC and private buses operate from Alibaug and Mumbai.

howToReach.title: By Train
details: Taxis and local buses available from Roha to Murud.

howToReach.title: By Air
details: Nearest airport: Mumbai (160 km) and Pune (180 km).
Private cabs or coastal route drives are convenient options.

howToReach.title: By Ferry
details: Ferry available from Gateway of India to Mandwa Jetty.
From Mandwa, take a bus or taxi via Alibaug to reach Murud.

bookingTips.description: Book stays early for weekends and public holidays.
Best season: November to February for calm weather.
Try local seafood thalis and Malvani cuisine.
Carry a camera or drone for fort and beach views.
